DOC.brief_title: Golimumab Safety Surveillance Program Using Ingenix NHI Database
DOC.detailed_description: The participant include study drawn Ingenix Normative Health Informatics Database , proprietary research database contain claim enrollment data date back 1993 member large , geographically diverse US health plan . This study include cohort participant claim consistent diagnosis rheumatoid arthritis , psoriatic arthritis ankylose spondylitis initiate golimumab , anti-TNF biologics , non-anti-TNF biologics , systemic non-biological treatment . Participants identify claim bear code dispense drug , procedure diagnose follow launch golimumab 8 year . A sample enrol health plan member without claim evidence diagnosis treatment Rheumatoid arthritis , psoriatic arthritis ankylose spondylitis also select . The claim database use estimate incidence primary outcomes serious infection , tuberculosis ( TB ) non-TB mycobacterial infection , malignancy lymphoma , select outcome . No study agent administer study . All participant receive standard-of-care treatment prescribe physician
